8113.title: This service does not sell your personal data

tosdr.case: This service does not sell your personal data

8114.quoteText: Because Cloze integrates with a variety of content imported, with your authorization, from your email, notes, files, reminders, calendar, phone, messaging, contacts, social media and other services,
8114.title: The service collects many different types of personal data

tosdr.case: The service collects many different types of personal data

8117.quoteText: By using our Services, you indicate your consent for Cloze to send cookies to your computer or other device in order to uniquely identify your browser and improve the quality of our Services.
8117.title: This service requires first-party cookies

8118.quoteText: You may turn off cookies in your browser however, in doing so, some or all of our Services may not work.
8118.title: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

8119.quoteText:
You may opt-out of marketing and promotional emails from us.
  • You may opt-out of phone and postal marketing.
8119.title: You can opt out of promotional communications

tosdr.case: You can opt out of promotional communications
